attributes.action: lobby the leaders of the Church of England, the Established Church, to reform the Church, to return its funds and assets to all the people of England.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Just imagine if the beautiful churches of England were available to the whole community, and not just a religious minority. Kept primarily as sanctuaries of peaceful contemplation and reflection they could provide other services such as, art, music, theatre, and discussions on topics as diverse as science, philosophy, psychology and the meaning of life, as well as providing the usual services of weddings and funerals to all members of the community.

Organised on a strictly non-religious basis the new reformed organisation would be open to all. In the past, when most people were, supposedly, religious, the Church was synonymous with the community and as such was funded by the community.

Lack of belief, in the unsubstantiated dogma of Christianity, should not deprive anyone of their heritage. Rather the Church should change to reflect the modern world and evolve into a non-religious entity to be enjoyed by the entire Community of England.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
